summaries.title: Prime Minister meets with the President of Brazil
summaries.summary:
- Prime Minister of India met with the President of Brazil.
- They discussed strengthening bilateral relations between India and Brazil.
- Focus on cooperation in trade, investment, and technology.
- Both leaders emphasized the importance of sustainable development.
- They agreed to enhance collaboration in international forums.

summaries.title: Joint Statement: India and Brazil - Two Great Nations with Higher Purposes
summaries.summary:
- India and Brazil reaffirm their partnership and commitment to global cooperation.  
- Both countries aim to enhance trade, investment, and sustainable development.  
- They focus on addressing climate change and promoting renewable energy.  
- India and Brazil support multilateralism and strengthening international institutions.  
- The nations emphasize cultural exchange and people-to-people connections.

summaries.title: List of Outcomes: State Visit of Prime Minister to Brazil
summaries.summary:
- The Prime Minister of India visited Brazil to strengthen bilateral relations.
- Key discussions included trade, investment, and technology cooperation.
- India and Brazil agreed to enhance collaboration in agriculture and climate change.
- A joint statement was issued to outline the outcomes of the visit.
- Both countries emphasized the importance of multilateralism and global governance.

summaries.title: Prime Minister conferred with the highest national honour of Brazil – “The Grand Collar of the National Order of the Southern Cross”
summaries.summary:
- Prime Minister of India received Brazil's highest honor, "The Grand Collar of the National Order of the Southern Cross."
- The award recognizes his contributions to strengthening India-Brazil relations.
- The ceremony took place during his official visit to Brazil.
- This honor highlights India's growing international influence.
- It reflects the importance of bilateral ties between India and Brazil.

summaries.title: English Translation of Press Statement by Prime Minister during Joint Press Statement with the President of Brazil
summaries.summary:
- Prime Minister held a joint press statement with Brazil's President.  
- Both leaders discussed strengthening bilateral ties between India and Brazil.  
- They emphasized cooperation in trade, investment, and technology.  
- The importance of cultural exchange and people-to-people connections was highlighted.  
- Both countries committed to working together on global challenges.

summaries.title: Curtain Raiser National Fish Farmers Day 2025
summaries.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
summaries.summary:
- National Fish Farmers Day will be celebrated on July 10, 2025.
- The event aims to promote fish farming and its benefits.
- It will highlight the achievements of fish farmers in India.
- The day will focus on sustainable aquaculture practices.
- Various activities and programs will be organized to raise awareness.
